Articles.Content:
Put together a new challenge and could use the talents of someone who is image-editing inclined! I have the two base images I want to use but after hours of trying to find some decent free software and learning to do what I want was taking way toooo long I decided to turn here. But the couple hours was not in vain as I definitely have a good idea of what I want. If you would like to help me just post or PM!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Basically I want the globe to appear as if it were in the helmet with the words "Sumus Non Solum" ("We Are Not Alone" in Latin)

Edited September 3, 2015 by Glaran K'erman
Pic Fix and Specificity

Put together a new challenge and could use the talents of someone who is image-editing inclined! I have to the two base images I want to use but after hours of trying to find some decent free software and learning to do what I want was taking way toooo long. But the couple hours was not in vain as I definitely had a good idea of what I want. If you would like to help me just post or PM!

Thanks, this actually made me learn how to embed albums! Yay!
